name: TestyourTrivia
0:
”Alexa open test your trivia”
”Alexa, ask test your trivia to start an easy math quiz”
”Alexa, ask test your trivia to start a medium science quiz”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: test your trivia
des:
You can ask for a quiz on any of the below categories. ex: Start an easy sports quiz.


* Alexa, open test your trivia.
* Start a {easy, medium, hard} {category} quiz.
* Ok, here's your first question. Say A,B,C or D...
* (5 multiple choice questions)...
* {Terrible, Good effort, Great Job, Perfect}! Your final score is {x} out of 5. Thank you for playing Test your Trivia! Let's play again soon!

Supported categories:

general knowledge
books
film
music
musicals
television
video games
board games
science
computers
math
mythology
sports
geography
history
politics
art
celebrities
animals
vehicles
comics
gadgets
anime
cartoons

You must say the category exactly as shown.

Keep playing and improve your knowledge over time!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
